Get signatures

Source: R/makeSignatures.R
getSignatures.Rd

getSignatures get signatures from a bugphyzz data frame imported with the physiologies function.

getSignatures(
  df,
  tax.id.type,
  tax.level = "mixed",
  Frequency = c("unknown", "sometimes", "usually", "always"),
  Evidence = c("unknown", "exp", "igc", "inh", "exp"),
  min.size = 1,
  min = NULL,
  max = NULL,
  num = NULL,
  remove_false = TRUE
)

Arguments

df

A data frame.

tax.id.type

A character string. NCBI_ID or Taxon_name.

tax.level

A taxonomy level. Check valid ranks with validRanks(). Default is 'mixed', which uses all valid ranks.

Frequency

A character string. Possible values are 'always', 'sometimes', 'usually', 'unknown'.

Evidence

A character string. Possible values are 'exp', 'igc', 'inh', 'asr', 'unknown'.

min.size

Minimum size of the signatures. Default is 1.

min

Minimum for range and numeric attributes.

max

Maximum for range and numeric attributes.

num

Exact number for numeric attributes.

remove_false

Whether include the creation of signatures with FALSE values or not. Default is TRUE, i.e., FALSE values are not included.

Value

A list of signatures (taxa)
